title: innum sutantaram
sahitya:
innum sutantaram kANEnE jagadIshA shrInivAsA svayamprakAshA


anupallavi

  van manak-koDum kOlil vAzhap-piriyaminri vAi viTTalarinEn varuttamellAm tIra


caraNam    pAsha bandha vinai nIngAdO nin parama karuNai ennait-tAngAdO
nashap-paDaiyum pin vAngAdO ayyA nallaruL arasu mun OngAdO
naraka vEdanai tarum arasak-koDumkOlinrip-parama sukha veLiyilE bhayaminri ulaviDa
